website_summaries.verdict: Sometimes simple is better. The simple styling of the Lacoste Lerond Canvas sneakers belies a superb construction that had many users mentioning they will recommend the kicks to their friends. They’re also quite comfy which is a significant point to consider when purchasing shoes.The uppers of these shoes seem to attract dirt quickly, however, being made of canvas, they’re also quite easy to clean. There is not much arch support in these low-tops either, but inserts might do the trick. The shoes do come true to size and provide an adequate fit.
pros: Lacoste Lerond Canvas trainers have a classic and simple style that makes them highly desirable, several reviewers said
Some consumers stated that these sneakers provide excellent value for the price
A good number of testers were highly pleased with the comfort their low-top sneakers bring
A few mentioned that these shoes look even better than expected
Lacoste Lerond Canvas sneakers are true to size according to plenty of purchasers
These lifestyle kicks were highly recommended by many users because of their quality construction
Two people mentioned that they loved the shoes so much, they will buy a second pair in a different color
The shoes provide a nice fit based on a few individuals’ comments
cons: Two people mentioned that the Lacoste Lerond Canvas sneakers get dirty fast
One person reported that the casual shoes provide no arch support

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: Great look on arrival. However rigid back cut both heels to pieces after 10 minutes of wearing. Soaked back of trainers in cold water which removed the blood. Wore thick socks and plasters second time of wearing to no avail. Also have only worn trainers twice playing tennis on astroturf and the trainers have discoloured beyond belief. Would not recommend unless you don't intend to wear and want to just keep them in a box for show.

product_meta.title: Lacoste Men's Lerond BL 2 Canvas Lace Up Trainer White
product_meta.description: The Lacoste men’s Espere sneaker is a refined, slim line silhouette, with uppers crafted from high quality nappa leather. It has supple cushioning at the heel and a vulcanised outsole ensure enhanced comfort. This shoe evokes Lacoste's tennis heritage and will look elegant paired with rolled denim and a striped T-shirt.
